report.title: Explore records using standard filters
report.description: Report designed for the explore records facility in iRecord, with standardised filtering parameters.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences_functional o JOIN cache_occurrences_nonfunctional onf on onf.id=o.id JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional snf on snf.id=o.sample_id JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id JOIN websites w on w.id=o.website_id and w.deleted=false #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# #idlist#

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include

param.name: default_input_form
param.description: Input form path to use when no other available

column.name: occurrence_id
column.template: {occurrence_id}

column.name: source
column.sql: snf.website_title || ' | ' || case when substring(snf.survey_title from 1 for length(snf.website_title)) = w.title then trim(substring(snf.survey_title from length(snf.website_title)+1)) else snf.survey_title end

column.name: recorder
column.sql: CASE WHEN LENGTH(snf.recorders)>30 THEN 'Recorder' ELSE snf.recorders END

column.name: associated_with
column.sql: (select string_agg(case when cttlassoc.default_common_name is null then '' || cttlassoc.preferred_taxon || '' else cttlassoc.default_common_name || ' (' || cttlassoc.preferred_taxon || ')' end, ', ') from occurrence_associations oa join cache_occurrences_functional oassoc on oassoc.id=oa.to_occurrence_id join cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttlassoc on cttlassoc.id=oassoc.taxa_taxon_list_id where oa.from_occurrence_id=o.id )

column.name: association_detail
column.sql: (select string_agg( case when oa.from_occurrence_id=o.id then case when cttl.default_common_name is null then 'c' || cttl.preferred_taxon || '' else cttl.default_common_name || ' (' || cttl.preferred_taxon || ')' end else case when cttlassoc.default_common_name is null then '' || cttlassoc.preferred_taxon || '' else cttlassoc.default_common_name || ' (' || cttlassoc.preferred_taxon || ')' end end || ' ' || assoctype.term || ' ' || case when oa.to_occurrence_id=o.id then case when cttl.default_common_name is null then '' || cttl.preferred_taxon || '' else cttl.default_common_name || ' (' || cttl.preferred_taxon || ')' end else case when cttlassoc.default_common_name is null then '' || cttlassoc.preferred_taxon || '' else cttlassoc.default_common_name || ' (' || cttlassoc.preferred_taxon || ')' end end || coalesce(' ' || assocpos.term, '') || coalesce(' ' || assocpart.term, '') || coalesce(' resulting in ' || associmpact.term, ''), ', ') from occurrence_associations oa join cache_occurrences_functional oassoc on oassoc.id=oa.to_occurrence_id join cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttlassoc on cttlassoc.id=oassoc.taxa_taxon_list_id JOIN cache_termlists_terms assoctype on assoctype.id=oa.association_type_id LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms assocpart on assocpart.id=oa.part_id LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms assocpos on assocpos.id=oa.position_id LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms associmpact on associmpact.id=oa.impact_id where oa.from_occurrence_id=o.id )

column.name: belongs_to_user
column.sql: CASE WHEN CAST(o.created_by_id AS character varying) = '#user_id#' AND o.website_id IN (#website_ids#) THEN true ELSE false END

column.name: belongs_to_site
column.sql: CASE WHEN o.website_id IN (#website_ids#) THEN true ELSE false END

column.name: input_form
column.sql: case when o.input_form is null then '#default_input_form#' else o.input_form end

column.name: pass
column.sql:
CASE WHEN o.data_cleaner_result='t' THEN '
' WHEN not w.verification_checks_enabled THEN '
-
' END

column.name: fails
column.sql:
case when o.data_cleaner_result='f' then replace(replace(replace(replace(onf.data_cleaner_info, '[', '
') end

column.name: status_hint
column.sql: case o.record_status when 'V' then 'Accepted' when 'R' then 'Not accepted' when 'T' then 'Test' when 'C' then case when record_substatus=3 then 'Plausible' when o.certainty='C' then 'Recorder considered this certain' when o.certainty='L' then 'Recorder considered this likely' when o.certainty='U' then 'Recorder considered this uncertain' else 'Not reviewed' end end || case o.record_substatus when 1 then ' as correct' when 2 then ' as considered correct' when 4 then ' as unable to verify' when 5 then ' as incorrect' else '' end || case o.query when 'A' then ', query raised and answered' when 'Q' then ', query raised' else '' end
